name: Cook the Book: Champagne Margaritas
description: While tequila can sometimes be a polarizing, I have yet to meet anyone who doesn't enjoy a glass of Champagne. In Fiesta at Rick's, Rick Bayless makes one of the most light and lovely apertifs I've had in a long time. Mixing up a batch of these at home brought to mind the easy drinking qualities of a mimosa as well as the bracingly limey refreshment of a margarita.
recipeIngredient: The finely grated zest (colored part only) from 1 lime
Superfine sugar, if needed for adding sweetness
A half lime for moistening the glass rims
1 bottle chilled brut Champagne or other sparkling wine
